metadata.title: SmartSpend - Offline Expense Tracking & 100% Private
metadata.description: The ultimate Local-First budgeting tool for iOS and Android. Your money, your rules. Offline and 100% Private.

hero.title: Your money, your rules.
hero.description: The ultimate Local-First budgeting tool for iOS and Android. Control your expenses without relying on the cloud.

aiBatchEntry.title: Track expenses with
aiBatchEntry.subtitle: Just type it, say it, or snap a photo. AI understands your expenses and turns them into records automatically.

textInput.title: Natural Text
textInput.description: Type as you speak: "Spent $50 on lunch and $20 on a taxi." AI understands amounts, categories, and dates.

voiceInput.title: Voice Recording
voiceInput.description: Record an audio describing your expenses. AI transcribes and extracts each transaction automatically.

imageInput.title: Receipt Photo
imageInput.description: Take a photo of your receipt or invoice. AI reads the items and turns them into transactions.

mockup.inputExample: Spent $50 on lunch and $20 on taxi

features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: Powerful tools to budget, analyze, and automate your financial life.

budget.title: Budget Intelligence
budget.description: Plan with real spending limits and savings goals.

stats.title: Deep Analysis
stats.description: Fair day-to-day comparison. Understand your habits.

subscriptions.title: Automation
subscriptions.description: Subscriptions and recurring payments under control.

privacy.title: Your privacy is our
privacy.subtitle: Unlike other finance apps, SmartSpend never sells your data or requires internet connection.

offline.title: 100% Offline
offline.description: Your data never leaves your device. Works completely without internet connection.

encryption.title: Local Encryption
encryption.description: All information is securely stored on your device with advanced encryption.

biometric.title: Integrated Biometrics
biometric.description: Protect your app with Face ID or fingerprint. Only you can access your finances.

noTracking.title: No Trackers
noTracking.description: We don't collect usage data or share information with third parties. Your privacy comes first.

backup.title: Local Backup
backup.description: Export your data in JSON or CSV format. Maintain total control of your information.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliant
gdpr.description: Designed under the strictest personal data protection standards.

footer.description: The ultimate Local-First budgeting tool. Your money, your rules, 100% private.
footer.madeWith: Made with passion for the financial community

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: We're here to help. Fill out the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

newsletter.label: I want to receive news and updates via email

name.min: Name must be at least 2 characters

message.min: Message must be at least 20 characters

errors.rate_limit_exceeded: You've sent too many messages. Please try again in 15 minutes.
errors.missing_fields: Please fill in all required fields
errors.invalid_message_length: Message must be between 20 and 5000 characters
errors.email_send_failed: Failed to send message. Please try again.
errors.network: Connection error. Please check your internet.
errors.default: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.domain_not_verified: Our email service is being configured. Your message has been logged.
errors.email_service_unavailable: Email service is temporarily unavailable. Your message has been logged.
errors.fallback_default: Your message has been logged and we will contact you at the email you provided.

success.title: Message sent!
success.message: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

fallback.title: Message received!
fallback.message: Our email service is currently being configured. Your message has been saved and we will contact you at the email address you provided.
fallback.subtitle: We appreciate your patience while we set up our email infrastructure.

metadata.title: Privacy Policy - SmartSpend
metadata.description: Learn how SmartSpend protects your privacy. Our comprehensive privacy policy details data collection, usage, storage, and your rights under GDPR, CCPA, and other privacy regulations.

header.title: Privacy Policy
header.subtitle: Your privacy is our absolute priority. This policy explains how we collect, use, protect, and handle your information when you use SmartSpend.

privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use, and disclosure of Your information when You use the SmartSpend mobile application and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

companyInfo.title: 1. Company & App Information
companyInfo.description: SmartSpend is a local-first budgeting and expense tracking application designed with privacy at its core. Our mission is to provide powerful financial management tools without compromising your personal data.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information (Optional)
items: Name or nickname (if you choose to set one)
personalInfo.note: Note: All personal information is stored locally on your device and never transmitted to our servers.

financialData.title: Financial Data (Local Only)
financialData.note: Important: Your financial data never leaves your device unless you explicitly export it or enable optional cloud backup.

deviceInfo.title: Device Information (Minimal)
items: Device type and operating system version (for compatibility)

locationData.title: Location Data
locationData.content: SmartSpend does not collect, store, or transmit your location data. All location-related features (if any) are processed locally on your device.

analytics.title: Usage Analytics
analytics.content: We collect minimal, anonymized usage statistics only if you explicitly opt-in. This data helps us improve the app and includes:
analytics.note: You can disable analytics at any time in Settings → Privacy → Analytics.

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.intro: We use the collected data for the following purposes:
dataUsage.weDoNot: We do not: Sell your data, use it for advertising profiling, share it with data brokers, or use it for any purpose beyond providing and improving SmartSpend.

thirdParties.title: 4. Third-Party Services & Integrations
thirdParties.intro: SmartSpend is designed to work offline with minimal third-party dependencies. However, certain optional features may involve third-party services:

analytics.title: Analytics Providers (Optional)
analytics.description: Used only if you opt-in to analytics. Collects anonymized usage data and crash reports.

payments.title: Payment Processors
payments.content: SmartSpend does not process payments directly. If you make in-app purchases, transactions are handled entirely by Apple App Store or Google Play Store. We do not receive or store your payment information.

cloudBackup.title: Cloud Backup Services (Optional)
cloudBackup.content: If you enable optional cloud backup, your encrypted data may be stored using:
items: iCloud: Apple's cloud storage service (for iOS users)
Google Drive: Google's cloud storage service (for Android users)
cloudBackup.note: Your data is encrypted before being uploaded to these services.

platformServices.title: Device Platform Services
platformServices.content: The app uses standard device services for:
items: Biometric authentication (Face ID, Touch ID, Fingerprint)

userRights.title: 5. Your Rights & Control Mechanisms
userRights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Right to Access
access.content: You can view all your data at any time within the app. Export your data in JSON or CSV format from Settings.

correction.title: Right to Correction
correction.content: Edit or update any transaction, budget, or profile information directly in the app.

deletion.title: Right to Deletion
deletion.content: Delete individual records or all app data. Uninstalling the app removes all local data.

portability.title: Right to Portability
portability.content: Export your data in standard formats (JSON, CSV) to transfer to other services.

howToExercise.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
items: Correction: Edit any transaction or budget directly in the app
Deletion: Settings → Data → Delete All Data, or uninstall the app
Opt-out of Analytics: Settings → Privacy → Analytics → Disable
Contact us: Use the contact information at the bottom of this policy

userRights.regionalRights: Regional Rights: Residents of the EU (GDPR), California (CCPA), Brazil (LGPD), and other jurisdictions have additional rights. Contact us for jurisdiction-specific requests.

financialData.title: Financial Data
financialData.content: Stored locally on your device until you delete it or uninstall the app. We do not retain copies on our servers.

analyticsData.title: Analytics Data
analyticsData.content: Anonymized analytics data is retained for up to 26 months to help us improve the app.

supportData.title: Support Communications
supportData.content: Retained for 2 years to help us provide better support and resolve disputes.

deletion.title: Data Deletion
deletion.intro: You can delete your data in the following ways:
items: Individual Items: Delete specific transactions or budgets in the app
All App Data: Settings → Data → Delete All Data
Complete Removal: Uninstall the app from your device
Cloud Backups: Delete backups from your iCloud or Google Drive account
deletion.note: Note: Once data is deleted from your device, we cannot recover it as we do not maintain server copies.

security.title: 7. Security Measures & Encryption
security.intro: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:

localEncryption.title: Local Encryption
localEncryption.content: All data stored on your device is encrypted using AES-256 encryption. iOS uses Data Protection, Android uses AES encryption.

biometric.title: Biometric Authentication
biometric.content: Optional Face ID, Touch ID, or fingerprint authentication to access the app.

secureBackups.title: Secure Backups
secureBackups.content: Optional cloud backups are encrypted before upload using industry-standard protocols.

noServerStorage.title: No Server Storage
noServerStorage.content: By default, no data is stored on our servers, minimizing exposure to data breaches.

limitations.title: Security Limitations
limitations.content: While we take extensive measures to protect your data, no method of electronic storage is 100% secure. We recommend enabling device-level security (PIN, password, biometric) and keeping your device's operating system updated.

international.title: 8. International Data Transfers & Compliance
international.intro: SmartSpend is designed to keep your data local to your device. However, certain optional features may involve international data transfers:

gdpr.title: GDPR (European Union)
gdpr.content: For EU users, we comply with the General Data Protection Regulation. If you opt-in to analytics, data may be transferred to the US under Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs). You can withdraw consent at any time.

ccpa.title: CCPA (California, USA)
ccpa.content: California residents have the right to know what personal information is collected, the right to deletion, and the right to opt-out of the sale of personal information. We do not sell personal information.

lgpd.title: LGPD (Brazil)
lgpd.content: We comply with the Lei Geral de Proteção de Dados. Brazilian users have rights to confirmation of processing, access, correction, and deletion of personal data.

other.title: Other Jurisdictions
other.content: We strive to comply with privacy laws in all jurisdictions where our app is available, including PIPEDA (Canada), POPIA (South Africa), and others.

international.contact: If you have questions about how we comply with specific privacy regulations in your region, please contact us using the information provided below.

mobileApp.title: Mobile App
mobileApp.content: The SmartSpend mobile app does not use cookies. We use local storage on your device to save your preferences and data. This storage is:
items: Deleted when you uninstall the app (unless backed up to cloud)

website.title: Website
website.content: Our website may use essential cookies for functionality and optional analytics cookies. When you visit our website, you will be presented with a cookie consent banner allowing you to control non-essential cookies.

types.title: Types of Cookies We May Use
types.essential: Essential: Required for the website to function properly
types.analytics: Analytics: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website (optional)
types.preferences: Preferences: Remember your settings and preferences

children.title: 10. Children's Privacy (COPPA Compliance)
children.intro: SmartSpend is not intended for use by children under the age of 13 (or the minimum age required for providing consent in your jurisdiction). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

parentalNotice.title: Parental Notice
parentalNotice.content: If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child under 13 has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately. We will take steps to remove that information and terminate the child's account if applicable.

compliance.intro: In accordance with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) and similar regulations worldwide:
items: We do not market to children under 13
We do not collect personal information from children under 13
Parents can review, delete, or refuse further collection of their child's information

contact.title: 11. Contact Information
contact.intro: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

privacyInquiries.title: Privacy Inquiries
privacyInquiries.supportNote: For general support inquiries, please visit our contact page.

dpo.title: Data Protection Officer
dpo.content: For GDPR-related inquiries or to exercise your EU data protection rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at:

contact.responseTime: We aim to respond to all privacy-related inquiries within 30 days. For complex requests or high volumes, this may take up to 90 days, in which case we will notify you of the delay.

changesNotice.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesNotice.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. For significant changes, we will provide a more prominent notice (including, for certain services, email notification of Privacy Policy changes). You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

metadata.title: Terms of Service - SmartSpend
metadata.description: Review SmartSpend's terms of service, user agreements, and acceptable use policy. Understand your rights and responsibilities when using our personal finance management app.

header.title: Terms of Service
header.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using SmartSpend. By using our application, you agree to be bound by these terms.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to SmartSpend. By using our application, you accept these terms of service. SmartSpend is a personal finance management application designed to help you track your expenses, income, and budgets.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.intro: You can use SmartSpend in two modes:

guest.title: Guest Mode:
guest.description: Your data is stored locally on your device. No account is required.

cloud.title: Cloud Mode:
cloud.description: By creating an account, your data is synchronized with our servers using Supabase. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions and Payments
subscriptions.content: SmartSpend offers an optional Pro subscription that unlocks premium features. Payments are processed securely through RevenueCat and the app stores (App Store, Google Play). Subscriptions renew automatically unless you cancel them before the renewal date. You can manage your subscription from your account settings in the corresponding app store.

ownership.title: Data Ownership
ownership.content: All your financial data is your property. SmartSpend does not share, sell, or use your data for advertising. You can export or delete your data at any time from the app settings.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.intro: By using SmartSpend, you agree to:

rules.legal: Use the application only for legal and personal purposes
rules.noAccess: Not attempt to access data from other users
rules.noModify: Not modify, copy, or distribute the application without authorization
rules.noDamage: Not use the application in a way that could damage or interrupt the service

limitations.title: Limitation of Liability
limitations.content: SmartSpend is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not responsible for financial losses, damages, or inaccuracies in the data. It is your responsibility to verify the accuracy of your financial records and perform regular backups of your data.

availability.title: Service Availability
availability.content: We make our best effort to keep SmartSpend available, but we do not guarantee 100% uptime. We may suspend or discontinue the service at any time with prior notice.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date. Your continued use of SmartSpend after the changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: If you have questions about these terms, you can contact us at:

cta.title: Have Questions?
cta.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please don't hesitate to contact us.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
